choices: Dose Wally let himself be picked up
114121.content:
"C'mon, son. It's nothing to ashamed about, your Mum and me just want you nice and dry." Dad smiled as he had to alsr pulled Numbah 4 up the stairs to get him changed.
"DAAAD-"
"Ah, ah, slugger. It's too late to be that loud. We'll get you all clean with a bath and then back to bed, sound nice?"
"It sounds crudy." He grumbled as they reached the bathroom.
"Honesty I don't know who on Earth would let you watch those scary movies. Well, lets get you in the tubby."
Despite working, Dad was always a lot more gentle, even motherly. He started to run the bath and Wally waited until the man was gone to strip of his wet PJs. Then he had to check the water for the Mega-Shark-Nado, it wasnt that scary of a movie, he told himself.
Soon Wally would be in the tub playing in a fantasy world of submerians when his father would come back in with clothes under his arm.
Wally covered his bare boy-chest, "Daaaaad!"
"Easy, slugger, nuthin' I haven't seen before." He said with a chuckle, laying out a set of foottie-Jammie's and a pull-up with Yipper designs on it.
"What is that?" Wally lost some color as he asked.
"It's just some protection for my little slugger. Look, it's even got those Yappers you boys like. Ow lets get you dressed." He grabbed a towel and went to grab his young son out of the water.
114121.title: His parents

1141211.content:
"This sucks."Numbah 4 mumbles to himself as his dad lifts him out of the tub and starts to dry him off with the towel.
"Oh come on slugger nothing to be ashamed about, many other boys your age need some protection at night." His dad smiles as he dries Numbah 4's hair.
"Still doesn't mean I wanna wear a sticken diaper."Wally mumbles as his dad but the towel aside and grabs the pull-up
"Oh don't think of it as a nappy son, think of it as your special night time undies."
"Fine but I still don't have to like it."Wally whines as he grabs the pull-up from his dad before quickly slipping it on.

"There see it's not so bad is it? And tomorrow we'll go get you some that look just like normal underwear."
"You mean I have to wear these more then once?!"Wally moans as he puts his pjs on
"It's better then waking up in a wet bed right?
1141211.title: Dose Wally let himself be picked up

11412111.content:
"As long as I can sleep." He grumbled, "and they better look like real underwear." Wally stated firmly. His friends would probably never let him live this down.
"They will, they will, just thought you'd like those Yapers for your first night, son." The man set Wally down to ready the pull-up so all Wally had to do was step into it.
"Its still a criddy diaper, Dad." Wally grumbled as he stepped in it and Dad pulled it up to his waist.
"There, nice and snug,yeah?"
"Its fine, whatever."
"Easy there, slugger. Someone's itchin' ta' go backt to sleep, eh?"
Soon Wally would be tucked back into his own bed for a few more hours of sleep. Tomorrow he had to be at the tree house early. Dose he wake up
11412111.title: "Yeah I guess."

choices: "fine. just tonight, i'm not wearin' these to the tree house."

"They won't know a thing, son." Said the man as he dressed Wally into his pull up, t was blue with a Yipper pilot on the front. "Besides. You probably won't need'em for long anyway. Lets just try'em tonight okay?"
11412112.title: "No it isn't!"

choices: You reach the end of the line.
An alarm flashes above your head.
123.content:
The conveyor belt moves slowly, but inevitably towards your conversion. You watch in horror as it removes the tattoo from the guy in front of you. The whole process makes you doubt your own uniqueness. But at this point you see there is no escape.

http://youtu.be/tnzOEvh46Po

You steel your nerves as the machine encompasses you.

In seconds it is over, you feel the swelling continue in your chest...

The unfamiliar weight grows, and you fight the temptation to explore your new body. You don't want to draw attention to yourself, once you reach the end of the line. Then... Then you'll get your chance to escape.

The belt shifts forward again, it's different now. You feel every little judder and shake, as your new nipples shift and shimmy making every movement an agony of ecstasy.
123.title: Numbuh 60

134.content: Which civilian child, do you wish to pick?
134.title: Civilian children

134111.content: Could it be the Delightful Children From Down The Lane?
134111.title: A villian

choices: some other versions of them like the twins, triplets or the good ones.
135.content: Can we include the DCFDTL?
135.title: someone else

choices: we cut back to the rest of the children
1351.content:
Father knew his children very well, even if he wasn't always interested enough to care. He knew doing their homework together ment the stronger two (Ashley in her bow and Bruce with his bowl-cut) allowing the weaker ones to copy off the answers. He knew this seeing their perfect grades. Lenny, who lacked common sense, could probably only get B-marks if he tried on his own, the same with Constance, but it was David's prefect grades that tipped him off to what the children were doing. If those public school morons even tried doing their job David would've been in a different class than the rest of his children. A less than prefect class taught in a trailer or a mostly unused part of the school. They couldn't have that.

What David was gifted in height was at the price of his intelligence. His siblings protected him very well, he almost always had a smile- never fully grasping the idea of things. Only that Father told them do something, it should be done.

Even now his children protected David as they stood around him in their little nightgowns and bathrobes, all planing to take the punishment for David's accident. They came to him this late saying they all had wet the bed.
"My children," Father adressed slowly, removing his pipe from his mouth "leave me alone with David."
All pf their tiny eyes got wide and everyone spoke at once, David had never talked to father himself and the others knew it was bad then- "NOW!"

With a puff of fire the children slowly went out of Father's study in a single line with heads hung. As each left David the scene became more clear and Father now just had one boy in front of him. The ten-year-old shook with fear as between his robe one could clearly see a wet patch on pajama pants that was growing again and even leaking a vit on to the tile.
"Y-yes Father?" David tried sounding as respectable as his siblings, but it was lost between held back tears.
"Oh my son," Father said sitting back in his armchair
1351.title: yes

info.brief_description: Strange things start happening to the Kids Next Door.
info.description:
There was another interactive like this, but it fell out of this site for some reason, ling with it's previous author, Kira, who must be given credit for it. I'll try to

Here are the rules:

1.) main character is not allowed to die.

2.) Adding adittional chapters must involve selected character faced with any of the following ( Such as diapering, age regression/progression, transforming, etc.)

3.) crossovers aren't allowed, stick with canon KND characters.

4.)Add nothing too inappropriate, no sexual content, gorely violence, or any of the sort, subtle references to such are okay.
